Content: 'Peripeteia' receives very positive reviews, praised for its unique, immersive, and atmospheric gameplay, drawing comparisons to classic immersive sims with a distinctive post-Soviet cyberpunk setting. However, many reviewers note significant bugs, jank, and performance issues, particularly concerning level design and enemy AI.
